articles.author: Priya Singh
articles.title: How to scan documents on your phone using Google Drive: A step-by-step guide - BGR India
articles.description: Notably Google Drive only allows Android users to scan documents as this functionality is not available on iPhone iPad or desktop.
articles.content: It is a bit difficult to keep a track of physical copies of important documents like bills, receipts, letters, notes and so on. Google allows users to keep a scanned soft copy of such documents handy… [+2072 chars]
